com.jscape.inet.terminal.commands
Interface ControlCommand

All Known Implementing Classes:
AMCommand, ANSICommand, BSCommand, CANCommand, CPRCommand, CRCommand, CUBCommand, CUDCommand, CUFCommand, CUHCommand, CUPCommand, CUUCommand, DACommand, DECIDCommand, DECSTBMCommand, DECTSTCommand, DSRCommand, EDCommand, EELCommand, EESCommand, ELCommand, ESCCommand, GMCommand, HTCommand, HTSCommand, INDCommand, LFCommand, NELCommand, NullCommand, RICommand, RMCommand, SCSG00Command, SCSG0BCommand, SCSG10Command, SCSG1BCommand, SGRCommand, SICommand, SMCommand, SOCommand, TBCCommand
public interface ControlCommand

Base interface for control commands. "Command" pattern [Gamma94].

Method Summary
 void execute(int[] params, Terminal terminal)
          Executes command giving parameters and Terminal object.
 void send(int[] params, Terminal terminal)
          Sends command to remote host.
 

Method Detail

execute

             Terminal terminal)
Executes command giving parameters and Terminal object.

Parameters:
params - array of int command parametrs.
terminal - target Terminal object.

send

void send(int[] params,
          Terminal terminal)
Sends command to remote host.

Parameters:
params - command parameters.
terminal - target Terminal object to send command.
